li.label: Trans Male
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} identifies strongly as a male. Physical traits related to the Male gender give mood boosts, while traits conflicting with it will give negative mood.

li.label: Trans Female
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} identifies strongly as a female. Physical traits related to the Female gender give mood boosts, while traits conflicting with it will give negative mood.

li.label: Trans: Androgyne
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} does not want to be identified as any gender. The closer to truly androgynous they are, the happier they are.

li.label: Body-content
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is content with their body, regardless of their identified gender. They will experience no form of dysphoria.

li.label: Body-sensitive
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is much more affected by dysphoria than normal.
